forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. South southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. South wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
Tonight, Downtown San Francisco is cloaked in a thick embrace of clouds and rain. The persistent patter of droplets against windows provides a rhythmic accompaniment to the evening, casting a sleepy, introspective mood over the city. As temperatures hover around 51 degrees, the air feels cool and slightly damp, with whispers of wind stirring from the southeast, lifting the chill just enough to remind one of the nearby coast. The certainty of rainfall could paint the streets with glistening reflections, yet it also brings an invitation for a cozy night indoors.

As Saturday unfolds, the city will remain under a continuous gray shroud, with rain destined to linger throughout the day. The high of 59 will barely shift, and as afternoon approaches, one might feel the temperatures retreating gently to the mid-50s. The gusts of wind, picking up to nearly 28 mph, will dance through the streets, sending leaves swirling and perhaps even nudging ambitious umbrellas inside-out. Such weather encourages a layered approach to attire – a warm jacket, sturdy shoes, and perhaps a trusty umbrella would suffice. It is a day made for quiet pursuits; residents might relish a warm beverage at a local café, delve into a good book by the fireside, or engage in leisurely explorations of nearby galleries, where the art is an inviting contrast to the drab outdoors. This Saturday unfolds as a reminder of the beauty in stillness, where the rhythm of the rain fosters contemplation and connection.
